short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes quickly and easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickQR enhances your browsing experience by enabling you to instantly generate QR codes for any web page you visit. With just a click of an icon, QuickQR converts the current webpage URL into a QR code, making it easy to share, save, or access web content on other devices.

Key Features:

- Instant QR Code Generation: Quickly create a QR code for the URL of the webpage you're viewing with a single click.
- Seamless Integration: QuickQR integrates directly into your browser, offering a seamless and intuitive experience without disrupting your workflow.
- High-Quality QR Codes: Generate clear, high-resolution QR codes that are easily scannable and compatible with any QR code scanning application.
- Privacy-Focused: QuickQR operates entirely locally, ensuring that the URLs you generate QR codes for are not sent to or stored on any server, preserving your privacy.
